subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Chris Phillips and Patrick Eaves scored 47 seconds apart in the opening minutes last night and the Ottawa Senators set a team record with their eighth straight win, a 5-1 victory over the visiting Toronto Maple Leafs.
snippet: Chris Phillips and Patrick Eaves scored 47 seconds apart in the opening minutes last night and the Ottawa Senators set a team record with their eighth straight win, a 5-1 victory over the visiting Toronto Maple Leafs.
